storyMetadata.logline: When the last generation ship, Echo-12, faces imminent collapse, Captain Jena Ortega discovers an ancient gateway that offers a new chance at survival and exploration.

protagonist.name: Jena Ortega
protagonist.coreMotivation: Survival and exploration of new worlds

supportingCharacters.name: Dr. Sophia Patel
supportingCharacters.relationshipToProtagonist: Expertise in unraveling mysteries of the gateway

worldAndSetting.primaryLocation: Echo-12 Generation Ship and the gateway

narrativeAnalysis.primaryTheme: Hope and resilience in the face of adversity
narrativeAnalysis.secondaryMotifs: Exploration, discovery, and the human spirit
narrativeAnalysis.centralConflict: Survival of the crew and the ship
narrativeAnalysis.resolution: The crew finds a new home and a chance to explore the unknown, concluding on a hopeful note.
